welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hendersonville, where the charm of our historic downtown and the beauty of our surrounding mountains await you. Enjoy our vibrant arts scene, delicious local cuisine, and outdoor adventures â€“ we're thrilled to have you here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nashville International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Nashville International Airport primarily serves domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Nashville International Airport primarily serves international airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smyrna Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
